text: Leptogenys peuqueti, is a species of ant of the subfamily Ponerinae. It is found in India, Sri Lanka, China, Vietnam, and Philippines. ==References== ==External links== * * at antwiki.org * *Animaldiversity.org *Itis.org Category:Ponerinae Category:Hymenoptera of Asia Category:Insects described in 1887
title: Leptogenys peuqueti
